sentence.Network_en: He hid behind a great bowlder and fell to listening.
sentence.Network_cn: 他躲在一块大圆石后面,静静地听着.

sentence.Network_en: Cloth, leather, rubber , wooden product , bamboo, crystal, plexiglass, tile acrylic, bowlder, etc.

sentence.Network_en: The large bowlder surface of table must be uplifted vertically in avoidance of breakage.
sentence.Network_cn: 大面积的餐台玉石面,必须竖抬,避免餐台断裂.
